title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 84.5 - Appraisals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 84.5 - Appraisals

State Regulations

Mortgage loans may be made by a bank, trust company, savings
bank or savings and loan association upon a written and signed certificate by
one person appointed by its board of directors or board of trustees which
states that the real property described in the mortgage has been examined and
which appraises the value of such property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
84.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
